class.name: WorkTaskViewDao
class.SQL: select WorkTask.id as WorkTaskView_id, WorkTask.caption as WorkTaskView_caption, WorkTask.taskDate as WorkTaskView_taskDate, WorkTask.deadLine as WorkTaskView_deadLine, WorkTask.taskstatus_id as WorkTaskView_taskStatus, usertable.firstName || ' ' || usertable.lastName as WorkTaskView_taskUser from WorkTask join usertable on WorkTask.taskuser_id = usertable.id offset ? limit ?

select WorkTask.id as WorkTaskView_id, WorkTask.caption as WorkTaskView_caption, WorkTask.taskDate as WorkTaskView_taskDate, WorkTask.deadLine as WorkTaskView_deadLine, WorkTask.taskstatus_id as WorkTaskView_taskStatus from WorkTask where taskuser_id = ?

class.name: WorkTaskDao
class.SQL: select WorkTask.id as WorkTask_id, WorkTask.caption as WorkTask_caption, WorkTask.taskContext as WorkTask_taskContext, WorkTask.taskDate as WorkTask_taskDate, WorkTask.deadLine as WorkTask_deadLine, WorkTask.taskstatus_id as taskStatus_id, WorkTask.taskuser_id as taskUser_id, usertable.firstName as taskUser_firstName, usertable.lastName as taskUser_lastName from WorkTask join usertable on WorkTask.taskuser_id = usertable.id where WorkTask.id =?
update WorkTask set taskuser_id=?, caption=?, taskContext=?, taskDate=?, deadLine=?, taskstatus_id=? where id=?
delete from WorkTask where id = ?
insert into WorkTask(taskuser_id, caption, taskContext, taskDate, deadLine, taskstatus_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

class.name: WorkNoteDao
class.SQL: insert into WorkNote(caption, noteDate, description, model_id, user_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from WorkNote where id = ?

select wn.id as worknote_id, wn.caption as worknote_caption, wn.notedate as worknote_notedate, wn.description as worknote_description, wn.model_id as subject_id, WorkTask.caption as subject_caption, wn.user_id as noteUser_id, usertable.firstName as noteUser_firstname, usertable.lastName as noteUser_lastname from WorkNote wn join WorkTask on WorkTask.id = wn.model_id join usertable on usertable.id = wn.user_id where wn.id = ?

select wn.id as worknote_id, wn.caption as worknote_caption, wn.noteDate as worknote_notedate, wn.user_id as noteUser_id, usertable.firstName as noteUser_firstname, usertable.lastName as noteUser_lastname from WorkNote wn join usertable on usertable.id = wn.user_id where model_id = ?
